setting.time: 64 AD, late afternoon, immediately after thunderstorm
setting.location: Via Appia, main road outside Rome, stone-paved thoroughfare
setting.weather: Fire finally extinguished, ash settling like gray snow, smoky air beginning to clear

characters.appearance: Christian survivor in his forties, ash-stained face showing grief and determination, hollow eyes witnessing destruction
characters.clothing: Brown wool cloak covered in ash and soot, leather boots stepping through debris, pack containing rescued sacred books
characters.position: Walking through devastated streets toward surviving Christian community
characters.action: Searching for fellow believers among ruins, carrying rescued Christian texts, helping other survivors

scene.mainElements: Stone-paved Roman road with large puddles reflecting patches of blue sky breaking through clouds, steam rising from wet surfaces
scene.details: Everything covered with gray ash like snow, blackened timbers still smoldering, stone pavement cracked from heat, wheel ruts filled with ash and debris, devastated world showing extent of destruction, smoke columns still rising from ruins, air thick with ash particles
scene.background: Roman city walls and gates visible ahead, aqueduct arches crossing valley with water cascading from storm runoff, hills sharp and clear in clean air
scene.atmosphere: World transformed by destruction yet spirit unbroken, acrid scent of burned buildings and ash, temperature finally cooled from fire's heat, sense of loss mixed with Christian hope for renewal

composition.cameraAngle: Low angle showing puddle reflections with figure walking through
composition.focus: Traveler's reflection in road puddles with steam rising around him
composition.depth: Foreground water reflections on stone, middle ground walking figure leaving ripples, background clear view of city walls

colorPalette.usageNotes: Rich, regal colors with metallic tones

rendering.detailLevel: high in key areas, atmospheric distance
